data.name: Frame - Portals on Steroids
data.detailed_description:
You probably know portals, those neat small thingies that stitch two different parts in space together. Well, frames can do that, but they can also do so much more.

Frames can move


Frames can change size of objects

Frames can change the gravity of objects



And frames can do even more:
  • The ubiquitous cubes and activation buttons.
  • A "Paint Gun" allows to dynamically open and close frames.
  • A "Light Gun" that changes how objects interact with frames.
  • Frames can have any size and appear in high numbers.

All this results in a staggering number of puzzle-possibilities and the carefully crafted levels make sure to use them to the fullest in this logic-based physics-puzzler.

Other features are:
  • A story almost as complex as the game mechanics.
  • All mechanics are explained "intuitively" through level-design without the need of explicit tutorials or text.
  • More than 80 levels, resulting in at least 6 hours of play-time.
  • A hint mechanic, so you never get stuck.
  • Full support for mouse/keyboard and controller with freely configurable inputs.

Thinking with portals is easy. Now, try thinking with frames.

data.short_description: Frames are devices that can stitch two parts in space together. And they can do much more: They can move, change size and gravity of objects and appear in any size or number... All these mechanics are used to provide mind-bending levels in this logic-based physics-puzzler.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: dedicated graphics card

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
